metadata.Title: CVE-2021-32078 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - negligible.
metadata.Description:
An Out-of-Bounds Read was discovered in arch/arm/mach-footbridge/personal-pci.c in the Linux kernel through 5.12.11 because of the lack of a check for a value that shouldn't be negative, e.g., access to element -2 of an array, aka CID-298a58e165e4.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-32078` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.13.0-1008-aws - 5.13.0-1008.9~20.04.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.13.0-1009-azure - 5.13.0-1009.10~20.04.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1051-azure-fde - 5.15.0-1007.8~20.04.1
No subscription required

No subscription required
